    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_112008</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Perception of light intensity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung der Lichtintensität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perception d'intensité de la lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Percepção da intensidade clara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percezione di intensità della luce della luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίληψη για την ελαφριά ένταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Opinión de la intensidad de luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the effect of background on the perception of light intensity. Brightness of three identical grey circles appears to be different when viewed against backgrounds that reflect different amounts of light.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">background</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brightness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grey circles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">identical circles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light intensity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Effekt des 
Hintergrundes auf der Vorstellung der Lichtintensität. 
Helligkeit von drei identischen grauen Kreisen scheint, 
unterschiedlich zu sein, wenn sie gegen Hintergründe angesehen wird, 
die unterschiedliche Mengen Licht reflektieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'effet du fond sur la 
perception de l'intensité de la lumière. L'éclat de trois 
cercles gris identiques semble être différent une fois visualisé 
sur les fonds qui réfléchissent différentes quantités de lumière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o efeito do fundo na 
percepção da intensidade clara. O brilho de três círculos 
cinzentos idênticos parece ser diferente quando visto de encontro aos
fundos que refletem quantidades diferentes de luz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'effetto di 
priorità bassa sulla percezione di intensità della luce della luce. 
Una luminosità di tre cerchi grigi identici sembra essere 
differente una volta osservata contro gli ambiti di provenienza che 
riflettono gli importi differenti di luce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την επίδραση του 
υποβάθρου στην αντίληψη για την ελαφριά ένταση. Η 
φωτεινότητα τριών ίδιων γκρίζων κύκλων εμφανίζεται να είναι 
διαφορετική όταν εμφανίζεται στα κλίματα που απεικονίζουν τα 
διαφορετικά ποσά φωτός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el efecto del fondo en 
la opinión de la intensidad de luz. El brillo de tres círculos
grises idénticos aparece ser diferente cuando está visto contra los 
fondos que reflejan diversas cantidades de luz.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
